  2. from django.utils.translation import ugettext_lazy as _

  4. from django import forms
  5. from cms.models import Page
  8. class LinkForm(ModelForm):
  9. page_link = forms.ModelChoiceField(label=_("page"), queryset=Page.objects.drafts(), required=False)
  11. def for_site(self, site):
  12. # override the page_link fields queryset to containt just pages for
  13. # current site
